ygData.subject: Re: Lets fix this,,, and level 33
ygData.msgSnippet: James, this will sound strange but the mages are complaining about the same thing. Their gripe is that other people are getting their components as loot, but
ygData.messageBody:
James, this will sound strange but the mages are complaining about the same thing.
Their gripe is that other people are getting their components as loot, but not them.

I can verify the fact that I have not yet gotten something for our class as loot. I
have pulled both Mage and Wizard components now though. Maybe this was intentional? Or
even more likely a possible mistake in who should get what in the programming. Who
knows really.

-Haytred


James wrote:

> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> If could all of you send in a feed back in the game and also email varent.
> That we would like to have something done about this shortage of words.
> There should be some sort of system where if a necro is looting there is a
> word, and if a wizard loots a ruin is there. Most of my friends are necro's
> in the game so we are all fighting for the same words. Or heaven for bid
> they might put words on vendors and just make the trade harder. I could live
> with that. If we could all put are heads together and do this as a group it
> could make a difference.
>
> Also I am level 33 now and not very sure what to hunt again. hehehehe I have
> been kill druids for the past few levels. Now I am at a loss. Any one out
> there have a clue at all. All I really want is my new spells.
>
